thread.title: Volkswagen stops U.S.clean diesel ads- VW spokeswoman
thread.title_full: Volkswagen stops U.S.clean diesel ads- VW spokeswoman | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Volkswagen stops U.S.clean diesel ads- VW spokeswoman
text:
Sept 25 Volkswagen has stopped running advertisements in the United States promoting its "clean diesel" cars, a Volkswagen spokeswoman told Reuters Friday.
The German automaker will resume running ads when the clean diesel cars are available again, she said. (Reporting By Jessica Toonkel; Editing by David Gregorio )
